info.author: Jurjen J. Stellingwerff
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 or later (LGPLv3+)
info.description:
================
Database Wizzard
================

This is a python web framework that integrates with databases.

It allows to read a current database scheme and generate sql-alchemy files
to access data from that database and directly produce screens based on those
tables.

It will be possible to directly insert and search through data with
autocomplete fields for related records and data validation.
This library can also be used to quickly create new pages with different
layout than the automatically generated pages.

A fully multi-user version is planned that shows changes from other users
directly into the current lists of records.


Example application
===================

There is a runnable example application in the directory /example.
Run it with:

    python example/authentication.py

Connect to the application with:

    firefox localhost:8765

Or insert your own favorite browser name instead.


Dependencies
============

python the language, with better unicode support
    python3

template generation:
    python3-mako

database abstraction and simple caching:
    python3-sqlalchemy

any database can be used including:
    sqlite3.. used in the example

    mysql-server
    python3-drizzle

    postgresql
    python3-psycopg2

and lots of other databases are possible:
    http://docs.sqlalchemy.org/en/rel_0_7/core/engines.html


Development tools
=================

help with unit tests:
    python3-nose

generate python documentation pages:
    python3-sphinx

check layout issues inside python code:
    pep8

detect other problems in python:
    python-pylint


Pylint under python3
====================

This is not yet packed for python3 but can still be used in the following way.

create a working directory, another name is ok here:
    mkdir devel
    cd devel

download sources:
    apt-get source python-pylint
    apt-get source python-logilab-astng
    apt-get source python-logilab-common

install python3 modules:
    cd logilab-common-0.58.0
    sudo python3 setup.py install
    cd ../logilab-astng-0.23.1
    sudo python3 setup.py install
    cd ../pylint-0.25.1
    sudo python3 setup.py install --no-compile

create a pylint3 script:
    sudo mv /usr/local/bin/pylint /usr/local/bin/pylint3
info.name: DatabaseWizzard
info.summary: Web framework for easy database access.
info.html_description:
This is a python web framework that integrates with databases.

It allows to read a current database scheme and generate sql-alchemy files to access data from that database and directly produce screens based on those tables.

It will be possible to directly insert and search through data with autocomplete fields for related records and data validation. This library can also be used to quickly create new pages with different layout than the automatically generated pages.

A fully multi-user version is planned that shows changes from other users directly into the current lists of records.

Example application

There is a runnable example application in the directory /example. Run it with:

python example/authentication.py

Connect to the application with:

firefox localhost:8765

Or insert your own favorite browser name instead.

python3
template generation:

any database can be used including:

and lots of other databases are possible:
